metadata.Title: CVE-2023-38712 on Ubuntu 20.04 ESM (focal) - medium.
metadata.Description: An issue was discovered in Libreswan 3.x and 4.x before 4.12. When an IKEv1 ISAKMP SA Informational Exchange packet contains a Delete/Notify payload followed by further Notifies that act on the ISAKMP SA, such as a duplicated Delete/Notify message, a NULL pointer dereference on the deleted state causes the pluto daemon to crash and restart.

criterions.comment: libreswan package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
